Please open the following link and enter your verification code.

{link}

InvestorMessageNormalConfirm.Subject: Successful Creation of your Profile
InvestorMessageNormalConfirm.Line1:
Dear {firstname} {lastname},

We are happy to inform you that we have approved your profile. You will now be able to access the investor dashboard via this link:
{stoLink}

InvestorRegistration.Subject: New Investor Registered
InvestorRegistration.Line1:
Dear Admin

A new Investor submitted his profile for KYC verification. Please login to your admin dashboard and review his KYC record in the Investor's list:

New Investor: {firstname} {lastname} ( ID {ID})

PasswordChanged.Subject: New Password
PasswordChanged.Line1:
Dear {firstname} {lastname},

We changed the password of your account. Please find the new one below.

Your new password is {password}

After successfully logging in you can set a personal password in the settings section.

enableAccountEmail.Subject: Login to your Dashboard Enabled
enableAccountEmail.Line1:
Dear {firstname} {lastname},

We enabled the login to your investor dashboard. You can now login to your dashboard with your email and password.

disableAccountEmail.Subject: Login to your Dashboard Disabled
disableAccountEmail.Line1:
Dear {firstname} {lastname},

We disabled the Login to your Dashboard. You cannot login your dashboard for the time being. Please contact us for assistance.

investorAccountAuthorized.Subject: Successful Registration of your Blockchain Address
investorAccountAuthorized.Line1: We have successfully accepted and registered your address on the Ethereum blockchain. You can now hold shares on the blockchain. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you need more information.

investorAccountFreeze.Subject: Your Shares on the Ethereum Blockchain
investorAccountFreeze.Line1: We have blocked your wallet on the Ethereum blockchain, and you can currently not receive or send shares. Please contact us for more details.

investorAccountRelease.Subject: Your Shares on the Ethereum Blockchain
investorAccountRelease.Line1: We have released your wallet on the Ethereum blockchain. You can now receive or send shares. Please contact us in case you need more information.

investorNewAddressWhitelisted.Subject: Your New Address on the Ethereum Blockchain
investorNewAddressWhitelisted.Line1: We have accepted and registered your new address on the Ethereum blockchain. Please transfer all your shares to the new address within the next 5 days

partialTakeoverAssetsFromInvestor.Subject: Take-Back of some of your Shares from the Blockchain
partialTakeoverAssetsFromInvestor.Line1: This is to inform you that we have taken back some of your shares from blockchain as result of some legal action. Please login to your dashboard and review your shares and status. Please contact us for more information.

InvestorAccountClosed.Subject: Closure of Account
InvestorAccountClosed.Line1: This is to inform you that we have closed your account and taken back all of your shares. Your account has been deactivated and you cannot login to your dashboard. Your account has been closed as result of some legal action etc. Please contact us for more information.

sharesTransferredBlockchain.Subject: Shares Transfer to your Blockchain Account
sharesTransferredBlockchain.Line1:
Dear {firstname} {lastname},

We have transferred shares to your account. You will find your new share balance immediately in your wallet.

Your Public Key: {key}

Shares Transferred: {amount}

sharesTransferredNonBlockchain.Subject: Transfer of Shares to your Account
sharesTransferredNonBlockchain.Line1:

We have transferred some shares to your account. You will find your new share balance immediately in your dashboard.

Shares Transferred: {tokens} {title}      Nominal {currency} {nominal}      Premium {currency} {premium}

sharesSoldBackNonBlockchain.Subject: Transfer of Shares from your Account
sharesSoldBackNonBlockchain.Line1:
Dear {firstname} {lastname},

We have transferred some shares from your account. You will find your new balance immediately in your dashboard.

Shares Transferred: {tokens} {title}      Nominal {currency} {nominal}      Premium {currency} {premium}

contractReceivedFromAdmin.Subject: New Contract for Review
contractReceivedFromAdmin.Line1: We have sent you a contract for review. Please login to your dashboard, download and review the contract and sign it if you agree with its contents.

forgotPassword.Line1:

twoFactorAuthentication.Line1:

newInvestorEmailReceived.Line1:

, You have received a new email from an investor. Please login the dashboard and process to the INBOX to view and reply that message.

{title}

sendInvitationToInvestor.Subject: Invitation to Join our Company for Investment Opportunities
sendInvitationToInvestor.Line1:
Dear {firstname} {lastname},

We would like to connect with you. If you accept the invitation, your address, contact and personal data as well as a copy of your identification documents will be released to us for identification reasons. At no time will any information in direct connection with your other investments be passed on to third parties

An embedded button "Connect" which can be clicked by the recipient, which directly confirms his approval (1st prio) or which leads the recipient to a function in his Investor Dashboard on the platform to approve the connection (2nd prio).

{text}

TellAFriend.Subject: Invitation to join company
TellAFriend.Line1:
Hi,

{username} has invited you to our platform

{tell} Here is the message from {username}
{invitation}
TellAFriend.Line2:
Hi,

{username} has invited you to take a look at the Konsento platform.Konsento offers the easiest way to manage Investor Relations and shareholdings in non-listed companies. Organizing Online meetings, exercising voting rights easily online, exchanging diverse information from company to shareholders and working collaboratively on documents related to investments are just a few of the offered facilitations.

Take a look at their website www.konsento.ch and enable yourself and "your" companies to collaborate more easily and generate added value through the Konsento platform.

{tell}{invitation}
